forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 77. West southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 101. West wind 5 to 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 2am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 65, with temperatures rising to around 67 overnight. North northeast wind 2 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
